backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, daily entries, measurements, workouts, and access-controlled CRUD operations with storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Report listing detected UI feature modifications mapped to affected files and components with confidence scores.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files describing their functionality and recent feature implementations.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining OKLCH-based light/dark theme tokens and global background, text, and border styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point enabling dark mode and mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling authentication, profile loading, enforced dark theme, and routing to login or main layout with toasts.
frontend/src/components/AboutView.tsx: Static informational view describing app features with cards and a back button.
frontend/src/components/AnalyticsView.ts: Analytics dashboard generating charts for weight, body fat, measurements, workouts, and rolling averages using fetched query data.
frontend/src/components/CalendarView.tsx: Renders the main calendar view, mapping entries to dates, showing saved-content indicators, and opening day details or comparison mode.
frontend/src/components/CameraCapture.ts: Handles in-app camera access with error handling, zoom, lens preference, and photo capture for entries.
frontend/src/components/compare/CompareD: Empty or missing content; file likely intended to implement a date‑picker modal for compare views.
frontend/src/components/compare/CompareS: Header component showing a selected date, day‑offset badge, and a button to open a calendar for one comparison slot.
frontend/src/components/DayDetailView.ts: Displays and edits a single day's entry including photos, measurements, and workouts, with camera integration.
frontend/src/components/MainLayout.tsx: Provides the app's top-level layout and navigation between calendar, analytics, profile, and about views.
frontend/src/components/PhotoComparisonV: Shows side‑by‑side photo comparisons for three selectable dates with variance and offset calculations.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for initial user profile creation, capturing name, gender, and unit preferences.
frontend/src/components/ProfileView.tsx: React profile settings form allowing users to view and update personal info and units, using II login and React Query mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading stored identities and exposing login and clear functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks wrapping backend calls for profiles, entries, and mutations with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom color variables, theming, and UI tweaks such as calendar dots and toast overrides.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: UI page rendering the login screen with branding, feature highlights, and a login button wired to the Internet Identity hook.
frontend/src/utils/cameraErrorMapping.ts: Normalizes camera-related errors into consistent categories with user-friendly messages and blocking status.
Attempts to select a standard rear camera lens using heuristics, with safeguards for Android Chrome PWAs and devices lacking labels.
frontend/src/utils/pwa.ts: Provides utilities to detect installed PWAs, Android Chrome environments, and their combination for special handling.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Utility functions for converting dates to/from backend nanosecond timestamps and formatting or comparing dates.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, including support for hash‑based routing and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom color tokens, extended theme settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing versions, existing features, pending requests, and project details for enhancing border prominence in CalendarView.
